nodes.documentation:
@title TokenCrowdsale contract allows multiple entities to put money into, and
       when a certain cap is reached. It accepts a token and returns another token.
nodes.name: TokenCrowdsale

@dev joinRequisitesPassedCheck is a check to see if a contributor is eligible to contribute
     in the crowdsale. This includes time and other checks.

getMyReservation().details: getMyReservation gets the reservation of the caller user.
getMyReservation().return: the reservation of the caller user, in TokenToAccept.

getReservationsData().details: getReservationsData, accessible only to the crowdsale owner, returns     the reservations about all contributors.
getReservationsData().return: the reservations of all contributors, in (address, TokenToAccept) parallel        arrays.

joinCrowdsale(uint256).details: joinCrowdsale allows the user to contribute by the specified amount of TokenToGive,     if it passes the checks.

params._amount: the amount of TokenToAccept to contribute with.

refundMe(uint256).details: refundMe refunds the pending contribution to the user, in the     specified amount.

params._amount: the amount of TokenToAccept to refund.

stopCrowdsale().details: stopCrowdsale sets the crowdsale as Stopped.

unlockCrowdsale().details: unlockCrowdsale unlocks the crowdsale if requirements are met.

devdoc.title: TokenCrowdsale contract allows multiple entities to put money into, and       when a certain cap is reached. It accepts a token and returns another token.
